item.title: Mattress dumped just by Fountain Close, 2nd February
item.description:
The mattress has been dumped for over 2 months, I have been trying to get a hold of the Housing Association but in the end they said that this case of fly tipping should fall under the council's remit. The location is just inside Fountain Close on the corner of Brookhill Road and Sandy Hill Road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brookhill Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: DANGEROUS HAZARD – Lime Bikes strewn across the footpath, 2nd February
item.description:
DANGEROUS HAZARD – Lime Bikes strewn across the footpath Unwelcome Street Hazard & Street Clutter Clear & present danger – trip hazard & street clutter... Carelessly, and dangerously, abandoned without any consideration for pedestrians, the able bodied or the frail or the disabled or the partially sighted... Lime eBike Users know this behaviour is “repugnantly anti-social” – it is extremely offensive and harmful to others, showing a complete disregard for social norms and a complete disregard for the well-being of our Local Community Action requested – please: a) remove (within the next two hours), and, b) create a “Geo-Fence Exclusion Zone” in this area I invite Lime to issue “your Lime bike Users” with either a Ban, and / or a £100 fine...

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Street, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
